title: Did Fox News Report That U.S. Rep. Omar Delivered a “Profanity-Laced Attack on President Trump”?
subtitle: Does quoting some else's words back to them constitute a breach of decorum?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Fox News reported that U.S. Rep. Ilhan Omar had delivered a "profanity-laced attack on President Trump" by repeating Trump's own words.
